name: AMERICAN SOCIETY OF TRANSPLANT SURGEONS
sampleDescriptions: Appropriations for Division of Transplantation at HRSA (HHS); MACRA implementation; removal of disincentives and incentives for organ donation; immunosuppressive drug coverage extension under Medicare; non-discrimination in health insurance; essential health benefits; quality health care and registries; hospital readmission legislation.
